context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

channels.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the channels taxonomy.

channels_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the channels taxonomy.

bin_number.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the bin_number taxonomy.

bin_number_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the bin_number taxonomy.

card_types.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the card_types taxonomy.

card_types_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the card_types taxonomy.

countries.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the countries taxonomy.

countries_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the countries taxonomy.

currencies.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the currencies taxonomy.

currencies_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the currencies taxonomy.

last_four_digits.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the last_four_digits taxonomy.

last_four_digits_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the last_four_digits taxonomy.

payment_methods.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the payment_methods taxonomy.

payment_methods_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the payment_methods taxonomy.

statement_batches.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the statement_batches taxonomy.

statement_batches_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the statement_batches taxonomy.

transaction_types.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified terms assigned in the transaction_types taxonomy.

transaction_types_exclude.description: Limit result set to all transactions except those that have the specified terms assigned in the transaction_types taxonomy.

payee_surname.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified payee_surname

payee_email.description: Limit result set to all transactions that have the specified payee_email

reference.description: Reference for the booking(s) the transaction was for.

card_types.description: The card type used for the transaction as returned by the Payment Service Provider.

forex.description: Forex applied to transaction (forex transaction only). These values will be auto-generated.

quote_id.description: ID for the applied exchange rate.

forex_rate.description: Exchange rate applied to transaction (forex transaction only). This value will be auto-generated.

channels.description: Unique identifier for the channel the transaction is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the currency of the transaction.

transaction_types.description: The transaction type. N.B. chargeback and chargeback-reversal are for admin use only.

bookings.description: Funds allocation for the booking(s) the transaction is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the object.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being applied to the nominated object.

allocation.description: Allocate part of the transaction to another channel.

channels.description: Unique identifier for the channel the allocation is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the currency the amount is in. Only required if operator is flat. Must match currency of allocation channel.

operator.description: Whether to allocate a percentage or flat amount.

action.description: Whether to allocate or retain the allocation.

deduction_from_total.description: The amount deducted from the transaction total for the allocation.

debit.description: The amount debited from the master channel.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the master channel.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being debited from the master channel.

credit.description: The amount credited to the allocation channel.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the allocation channel.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being credited to the allocation channel.

psp.description: The payment service provider for the transaction.

payment_methods.description: The payment method for the transaction.

payee_name.description: The name of the payee as registered to their payment method (e.g. cardholder name).

payee_surname.description: The surname of the payee as returned by the Payment Service Provider.

payee_email.description: The email address of the payee.

countries.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 value of the country the payment method is registered in.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the user requesting the transaction.

bin_number.description: BIN number of the credit card used for the transaction.

attempt_3ds.description: Whether to attempt to enable 3DSecure on this transaction.

3ds_redirect_url.description: URL to redirect to after 3DSecure. Required if attempt_3ds is enabled

linked_id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction that we are applying the transaction_type to.

trust_id.description: Trust My Travel identifier for the transaction.

author.description: The user ID of the author of the transaction.

created.description: The date the transaction was created, in GMT.

modified.description: The date the booking was last modified, in GMT.

title.description: The name of the transaction. Auto generated from booking title and transaction type

total_remaining.description: The total available for refund, capture or void on the transaction.

card_types.description: The card type used for the transaction as returned by the Payment Service Provider.

statement_batches.description: The statement batch for the transaction.

last_four_digits.description: Last four digits of the credit card used for the transaction.

forex.description: Forex applied to transaction (forex transaction only). These values will be auto-generated.

quote_id.description: ID for the applied exchange rate.

forex_rate.description: Exchange rate applied to transaction (forex transaction only). This value will be auto-generated.

payment_ids.description: IDs of Trust My Travel credits and debits generated in relation to the transaction.

adjustments.description: IDs of any transactions that adjusted this one.

channels.description: Unique identifier for the channel the transaction is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the currency of the transaction.

transaction_types.description: The transaction type. N.B. chargeback and chargeback-reversal are for admin use only.

bookings.description: Funds allocation for the booking(s) the transaction is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the object.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being applied to the nominated object.

allocation.description: Allocate part of the transaction to another channel.

channels.description: Unique identifier for the channel the allocation is for.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the currency the amount is in. Only required if operator is flat. Must match currency of allocation channel.

operator.description: Whether to allocate a percentage or flat amount.

action.description: Whether to allocate or retain the allocation.

deduction_from_total.description: The amount deducted from the transaction total for the allocation.

debit.description: The amount debited from the master channel.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the master channel.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being debited from the master channel.

credit.description: The amount credited to the allocation channel.

currencies.description: The ISO 4217 value of the base currency of the allocation channel.

total.description: The base currency total in cents that is being credited to the allocation channel.

psp.description: The payment service provider for the transaction.

payment_methods.description: The payment method for the transaction.

payee_name.description: The name of the payee as registered to their payment method (e.g. cardholder name).

payee_surname.description: The surname of the payee as returned by the Payment Service Provider.

payee_email.description: The email address of the payee.

countries.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 value of the country the payment method is registered in.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the user requesting the transaction.

bin_number.description: BIN number of the credit card used for the transaction.

attempt_3ds.description: Whether to attempt to enable 3DSecure on this transaction.

3ds_redirect_url.description: URL to redirect to after 3DSecure. Required if attempt_3ds is enabled

3ds_response.description: URL to redirect to after 3DSecure. Required if attempt_3ds is enabled

value.description: Value for 3DS response. Either a redirect URL or HTML form.

api_urls.description: URL of Spreedly attempts to hit spreedlycallback endpoint

linked_id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction that we are applying the transaction_type to.
